alert.note: Alert for Rensselaer; Washington (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 12:13PM EST until December 19 at 7:40PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hoosic River at Eagle Bridge. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, a dozen homes near Eagle Bridge evacuated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM EST Monday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 14.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hoosic River Eagle Bridge Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Mon 11 am: 9.2 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 10.5 Mon 7 pm 13.7 Tue 1 am 14.2 Tue 7 am 12.5 Tue 1 pm 11.1 Tue 7 pm 10.2 Wed 1 am 9.4 Wed 7 am 8.6 Wed 1 pm 8.0 Wed 7 pm 7.5 Thu 1 am 7.0 Thu 7 am 6.6 &&
